trans-unit.source: Set Up a Location Card and Define Transfer Routes| Microsoft Docs

seg-source.mrk: Set Up a Location Card and Define Transfer Routes| Microsoft Docs

target.mrk: Nastavení Karty lokace a definování Trasy transferu | Microsoft Docs

trans-unit.source: You create a location card for each place you store inventory items, for example, a warehouse or distribution center, and set up routes to transfer items between locations.

seg-source.mrk: You create a location card for each place you store inventory items, for example, a warehouse or distribution center, and set up routes to transfer items between locations.

target.mrk: Pro každou lokaci, kam ukládáte skladové zboží, například sklad nebo centrum distribuce, vytvořte kartu umístění a nastavte trasy pro transfery zboží mezi lokacemi.

trans-unit.source: Set Up Locations

seg-source.mrk: Set Up Locations

target.mrk: Nastavení Lokací

trans-unit.source: If you buy, store, or sell items at more than one place or warehouse, you must set each location up with a location card and define transfer routes.

seg-source.mrk: If you buy, store, or sell items at more than one place or warehouse, you must set each location up with a location card and define transfer routes.

target.mrk: Pokud kupujete, skladujete nebo prodáváte zboží na více než jednom místě nebo skladu, musíte nastavit každou lokaci pomocí karty lokace a definovat trasy transferu.

trans-unit.source: You can then create document lines for a specific location, view availability by location, and transfer inventory between locations.

seg-source.mrk: You can then create document lines for a specific location, view availability by location, and transfer inventory between locations.

target.mrk: Poté můžete vytvořit řádky dokumentů pro konkrétní lokaci, zobrazit dostupnost podle lokace a převést zásoby mezi lokacemi.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Manage Inventory](inventory-manage-inventory.md).

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see [Manage Inventory](inventory-manage-inventory.md).

target.mrk: Pro více informací navštivte [Správa skladu](inventory-manage-inventory.md).

trans-unit.source: To create a location card

seg-source.mrk: To create a location card

target.mrk: Vytvoření Karty lokace

trans-unit.source: Choose the ![Lightbulb that opens the Tell Me feature](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Tell me what you want to do") icon, enter **Locations**, and then choose the related link.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the ![Lightbulb that opens the Tell Me feature](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Tell me what you want to do") icon, enter **Locations**, and then choose the related link.

target.mrk: Vyberte ikonu ![Žárovky, která otevře funkci Řekněte mi](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Řekněte mi, co chcete dělat"), zadejte ** Lokace ** a poté vyberte související odkaz.

trans-unit.source: Choose the **New** action.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the **New** action.

target.mrk: Zvolte akci **Nový**.

trans-unit.source: On the **Location Card** page, fill in the fields as necessary.

seg-source.mrk: On the **Location Card** page, fill in the fields as necessary.

target.mrk: Na stránce **Karta lokace** vyplňte pole podle potřeby.

trans-unit.source: Repeat steps 2 and 3 for every location where you want to keep inventory.

seg-source.mrk: Repeat steps 2 and 3 for every location where you want to keep inventory.

target.mrk: Opakujte kroky 2 a 3 pro každou lokaci, kde chcete vést inventář zásob.

trans-unit.source: Many fields on the location card refer to the handling of items in inbound and outbound warehouse processes.

seg-source.mrk: Many fields on the location card refer to the handling of items in inbound and outbound warehouse processes.

target.mrk: Mnoho polí na kartě umístění odkazuje na manipulaci se zbožím v procesech vstupního a výstupního skladu.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Setting Up Warehouse Management](warehouse-setup-warehouse.md).

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see [Setting Up Warehouse Management](warehouse-setup-warehouse.md).

target.mrk: Pro více informací navštivte [Nastavení správy skladu](warehouse-setup-warehouse.md).

trans-unit.source: To create a transfer route

seg-source.mrk: To create a transfer route

target.mrk: Vytvoření trasy transferu

trans-unit.source: Choose the ![Lightbulb that opens the Tell Me feature](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Tell me what you want to do") icon, enter **Transfer Routes**, and then choose the related link.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the ![Lightbulb that opens the Tell Me feature](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Tell me what you want to do") icon, enter **Transfer Routes**, and then choose the related link.

target.mrk: Vyberte ikonu ![Žárovky, která otevře funkci Řekněte mi](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Řekněte mi, co chcete dělat"), zadejte **Trasy transferu** a poté vyberte související odkaz.

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, from any **Location Card** page, choose the **Transfer Routes** action.

seg-source.mrk: Alternatively, from any **Location Card** page, choose the **Transfer Routes** action.

target.mrk: Případně z jakékoli stránky **Karty lokace** vyberte akci **Trasy transferu**.

trans-unit.source: Choose the **New** action.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the **New** action.

target.mrk: Zvolte akci **Nový**.

trans-unit.source: On the **Location Card** page, fill in the fields as necessary.

seg-source.mrk: On the **Location Card** page, fill in the fields as necessary.

target.mrk: Na stránce **Karta lokace** vyplňte pole podle potřeby.

trans-unit.source: You can now transfer inventory items between two locations.

seg-source.mrk: You can now transfer inventory items between two locations.

target.mrk: Nyní můžete přenášet skladové zboží mezi dvěma lokacemi.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Transfer Inventory Between Locations](inventory-how-transfer-between-locations.md).

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see [Transfer Inventory Between Locations](inventory-how-transfer-between-locations.md).

target.mrk: Pro více informací navštivte [Převádění zásob mezi lokacemi](inventory-how-transfer-between-locations.md).
